trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles input related routed events.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que processa entrados eventos encaminhados relacionados.

trans-unit.source: No existing event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum evento existente nas [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] utiliza o <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler>Delegar.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The event data type for this class, <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs>, is the base class for various more specific event data classes for input.
trans-unit.target: Tipo de dados de evento para esta classe <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs>, é a classe base para várias classes de dados evento mais específicas para a entrada.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs> defines the event data properties of input events that are common regardless of the device that initiated the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs>Define as propriedades de dados de eventos de eventos de entrada que são comuns independentemente do dispositivo que iniciou o evento.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: An example of a delegate that uses <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs> derived event data and that corresponds to an existing input event is <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler>.
trans-unit.target: Um exemplo de um delegado que utiliza <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs>dados de eventos derivada e que corresponde a uma entrada existente evento é <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs>
